DOC.criteria: Obese patient ( body mass index ( BMI= > 30kg/m2 ) high insulin resistance ( measure Homeostasis Model Assessment Insulin Resistance Index ( HOMAIR ) > 5.5 . Lean subject ( BMI < 28kg/m2 ) low insulin resistance ( HOMAIR < 3.3 ) . Exclusion Criteria ( patient ) : Type 2 diabetes Acute chronic infection Inflammatory disease endocrine disorder .
